author: AClymer

changelog.release_notes:
Added timeout to Splash screen.
Fixed surf data fetch issue.

Pebble Time version coming soon...
It's LIVES! Tweaked some UI components and made the navigation more natural Added a Splash/Info screen

Completely Redesigned UI
- the new user interface more closely resembles Spitcast.com UI
- added Swell and Tide info
- added nifty app icon to top bar (looks cool)
- more buttons = more functions!
      Up - move north one spot
      Down - move south one spot
      Select Single Click - *new* Move forward in time 1 hour (up to 1 week !!!!!)
      Select Double Click - *new* refresh location (plus vibrate when location found)
      Select Hold (1/2 sec) - *new* refresh current spot data (does not relocate)
      Back Single Click - *new* move back in time 1 hour (to current hour)
      Back Hold (1/2 sec) - *new* exits app

Other updates to improve connection reliability and speed

There may be some bugs in this slightly incomplete version (see TODO note#1) but I wanted to get it out there because it is such an improvement from the last release.

TODO
 - completely rewrite this app (I lost all my source files for this version)
 - flick wrist to refresh (free up a button function)
 - add a map layer to show regional info like water temp, swell direction, location, etc...

Updated UI to look more like SpitCast.com
Streamlined the code in preparation for coming menus in v0.7

BETA V0.60 BIG ASS UPDATE! You now have all 300+ surf spots from SpitCast available on your wrist! 
Along with:
- Water Temps (by county)
- New Wind Icon (eh)
- Initially shows you the closest spot, and now allows you to scroll up or down the coast from there.
- SELECT now supports a double click event which will return you to the Nearest spot from anywhere in the scroll list (single click still refreshes the current spot).

description:
Instant access to the nearest Left Coast gnar! Get surf reports from the spots closest to you. 

**NEW UI - Completely redesigned**
Now with forecast info for up to 1 week!

UP/DOWN - Change Spot
SELECT/BACK - (Single Click) - Next/Prev hour
SELECT/BACK (Double Click) - Next/Prev Day
SELECT (Hold) - Refresh Location/Time
BACK(Hold) - Exit App

latest_release.release_notes:
Added timeout to Splash screen.
Fixed surf data fetch issue.

Pebble Time version coming soon...

title: SpitCast Surf Report
